prompt: Create a centered, print-ready vector illustration of the PRINT ARTWORK only on a vibrant hot pink solid background. Include a thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY; do NOT add a square frame or border around the entire image. Composition: top arched headline TEXT Hungarian: "CSAK EGY KAPÁS" (above) set in bold, hand-drawn uppercase display type with chunky rounded letterforms, aqua-to-cyan fill, subtle white highlight, and a matching thick black outline. Center: a circular, playful cartoon scene showing a bearded fisherman in a hat holding a curving fishing rod in one hand and a frothy beer mug in the other, a large green bass leaping from stylized water with dynamic splash lines and motion arcs, a simple yellow sun and horizontal water bands in the background, and cattails at the scene edges. All graphics are flat, bold, clean vector shapes with high contrast colors and no photorealism. Bottom curved slogan TEXT Hungarian: "VÁLASZT EL A BOLDOGSÁGTÓL" (below) in a matching display type, slightly condensed, aqua gradient fill with white highlight and the same thick black outline as the other elements. Maintain strong hierarchy (headline large, illustration dominant, slogan below), centered alignment, balanced spacing, and print-ready cleanliness. Use limited, high-contrast palette, crisp outlines, no fabric texture, no mockup effects, no drop shadows, and no border around the whole image. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
negative_prompt: mockup, garment, clothing, fabric texture, model, photo, photorealistic, drop shadows, background gradients, border, frame, watermark, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting
